title: urf?
body: so ive been off for a week or so been unable to play but ive vaguely heard urf was on i was wondering is that still going and when will it stop because i havent been able to play

replies.body: Its in PBE as of now...
cheers so does that mean it will go live soon ish
If theres no problems, usually it goes on after the patch, say next weekends its when it will be on
ARURF actually, Urf doesn't exist anymore according to Riot.
